introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use the Dristi App.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
content: We collect minimal personal data, such as your email address and usage data, to improve our services.
We may also collect data related to your device and interactions within the App.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your personal data will only be used for enhancing user experience and improving services. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionality of the App, such as remembering your preferences and login information.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy.

userRights.title: Your Rights
content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data.
You can request the deletion of your data by contacting us at any time.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: The App may include links to third-party services, such as hotel booking platforms. These services have their own privacy policies.
